product_name: Coleman Signature High Tech CPX Lantern
long_description: The Coleman Signature High Tech CPX lantern lights up your campsite so you can keep having fun without the sun. Single CREE 7090 XR-E LED puts out 175 lumens; lantern has a rotating switch that allows you to set the light output at your desired level. LED is located on the bottom and shines upward through a cone for uniform light dispersion. Lantern is powered by 4 D batteries (sold separately) that provide up to 56 hrs. of use. Lantern can also be powered by CPX 6-compatible power sources, such as the Coleman CPX 6 Portable Electronics charger (sold separately). Weather-resistant construction stands up to regular use in the outdoors. Coleman Signature High Tech CPX lantern has a bail handle with rubber sleeve for comfort and a secure grip.
short_description: The Coleman Signature High Tech CPX lantern lights up your campsite so you can keep having fun without the sun.
